caption.title: Probabilistic projections for winter East Sea surface temperature change from 1941–2000 to 2061–2100 [K] under the RCP8.5 emissions scenario for the “trend only” Winter_SST cross-validation experiment.
caption.p: Subplots differ in the assumed “true” model. Red circles are deterministic projections from each remaining model, red dotted lines are 90% posterior credible intervals. Black lines are changes from the “true” models.
